text: US Sailing's Miami Olympic Classes Regatta is an annual sailing regatta at the US Sailing Center in Miami, the United States part of the ISAF Sailing World Cup.http://www.sailing.org/worldcup/miami_2018.php It hosts the Olympic and Paralympic classes.http://miami.ussailing.org/event-background-past-champions/ ==Winners== Winners of the regatta in each
